transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Mam, Vineet baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haanji sir. Sir, maine cross check karaya tha apni team ke sath actually. Haanji, boliye.
Customer: To jo aap bata rahe hain na ki call hui
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Ji ji mam aa rahi hai, bataiye.
Customer: Hmm, jo aap keh rahe the na ki sir is month mein
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai na aapko sir?
Customer: Ji ji ji aa rahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Haan, to sir aap keh rahe the na ki November ke month mein bhi four five days pehle ek meeting schedule hui thi and usme se meri company ki team ne baat kari hai.
Customer: Sir actually baat hui thi but November ke month mein baat nahi hui thi, month of September mein baat hui thi aapki company mein meri company ke through.
Executive: Bilkul bhi nahi mam, aapke number se call aaya hua hai IndiaMART ke upar, aap hi ke number se, is number se.
Customer: Sir, I haven't called IndiaMART.
Executive: Aapko call aaya hoga 24th of November ko.
Customer: Aap mujhe number bataiye sir kis number pe call aayi hai?
Executive: Yahi primary 908 wala jiske last mein hai, jis se maine call kiya tha aur upar se na ek WhatsApp pe aapke paas feedback gaya hoga us pe not satisfied mark kiya gaya hoga.
Customer: We are not, we are not talking about feedback. Abhi hum is point pe baat kar rahe hain ki aapne ye bola hai ki November month mein kisi ne baat kari hai over a call and us call pe ye record hua hai ki humne aap se pricing puchi ki hamara balance kitna due hai, right?
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Wo conversation sir September month mein hui thi, Mr. Ujjwal ke sath meri company mein mere company ne company se kisi ne baat kari thi aapki company mein.
Executive: Mam 24th of November ko koi meeting nahi hui aap keh rahe ho, aapke yaha pe koi aisa banda nahi hai jisne meeting ki hai?
Customer: No, no, we did. Hamare paas notification aaya tha.
Customer: Sir, main aapko, sir main aapko ek cheez clear karti hu. Aap ek minute call pe rahiye ek baar.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji ji mam boliye, aapne kaha na hold kijiye.
Customer: Achha, haanji sir, to main ye clear kar rahi thi 26th September ko Mr. Ujjwal se meri company mein se HR ne baat kari thi 26th September 2025 ko and yahi discuss jo aap mujhe bata rahe hain na ki balance ke bare mein yahi discussion hua tha but September month mein hua tha.
Executive: Mam September ke baad 24th of November se aapke number se IndiaMART pe call aaya hua hai aur Ujjwal se video meeting hui hai. Hamare paas history rehti hai, us history mein pura update rehta hai. Ab ye to pata nahi kya conversation hua hoga Ujjwal ka aur unka lekin ye pata hai ki aapke number se call aayi hai aur video meeting hui hai.
Customer: Sir, video meeting to nahi hui hai because mere paas notification aaya tha and I wasn't available to maine meeting join nahi kari thi. This is clear. Baki aap jo keh rahe hain ki call pe baat hui thi to aap mujhe ek baar number bata dijiye main cross check kar leti hu apne phone mein bhi hand to hand.
Executive: Mam aapka number hi ye hai jo primary wala starting 96 se end 908 se hai matlab mere ko yaha pe wo number pe marking rehti hai to pura number nahi dikhta hai lekin aapne kon se number se call kar thi sir aapne kon se number se call kari thi hume?
Customer: Ujjwal ne apne number se call kiya tha, matlab Ujjwal ke DID number se call kiya tha, Ujjwal ka DID number kya hai?
Customer: Sir unke last mein 7390 hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo uska personal number hai Ujjwal ka, uske na mam jo IndiaMART ka DID number hai usse call kiya tha.
Customer: Aap please mujhe wo number bata dijiye.
Executive: 80353 80353
Customer: 803
Executive: 80
Executive: 353
Customer: Okay.
Executive: 43982
Customer: 43982. Sir mere paas is number se call 25th November ko do baar aayi hai and ek call mere paas kal ko aayi hai.
Executive: 24th ko koi call nahi?
Executive: Mam I don't know kya aapki taraf se incoming nahi hai.
Customer: Sir no not possible, main aapko ek
Executive: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi mam, ek kaam karte hain, abhi to sir invalid hona hai ye jo concern hai isme to koi baat hi nahi hui.
Customer: No no sir, baat hi nahi hui hai because I did receive a call from this number main wo bhi kar rahi hu but 25th November ko mere paas do call aayi hai aapke yaha se aur ek call mere paas kal aayi hai and 25th November ko bhi do call jo aayi hai dopahar ko 1:01 minute pe aayi hai and dusri call 1:02 minute pe aayi hai. And dusri call mere paas kal aayi hai.
Executive: Kya ho sakta hai, kya galti hui hai?
Customer: Correct and baki jo aap mujhe conversation bata rahe hain na balance wali wo conversation definitely hui hai aapki team ke sath hamari but wo September mein hui hai.
Executive: Mam main check karata hu ki meeting hui hai, kitni der ki hui hai, kiske sath hui hai, kya call aaya tha aapke paas.
Customer: Correct because agar online meeting hoti to pehle sir hum over call hi discuss kar lete hain na ki meeting ka agenda kya hai. Hum hand to hand clear karte hain.
Executive: Aapke yaha staff hai?
Customer: Haan sir mera IndiaMART it's just me who uses and meri HR use karti hai aur koi use nahi karta. But ye hota hai ki hum junior teams ko hum junior teams ko allow nahi karte meeting mein attend karna because aap logo ki baat directly humse chalti hai.
Executive: Thik hai mam, main check karata hu. But aap please aap isse cross check karwa dijiye ek baar to easy ho jayega.
Executive: Thik hai, sure mam, main check karata hu. Mam main aapka concern close karta hu, aapko ek feedback aayega usko please satisfied mark kar dijiyega ye waise hi not satisfied hai.
Customer: But please aap, haan ye valid hai hi nahi because hamari koi baat hui nahi hai sir.
Executive: Ji, sure mam. Alright. Okay mam. Thank you.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer denies a meeting on November 24th.

- Claims balance discussion happened in September.

- Wants to know why call is showing in records.



Resolution:

- Executive will cross-check the meeting details.

- Executive will close the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check meeting details.

- Customer to receive feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, call, cross-check, balance, feedback
